item.description:
Join us out here in the BURBS for a casual night out with other separated and divorced members. Drinks at 6:30, dinner at 7:00.

Check out their website for menu, directions, etc ...
http://45restaurant.c...

I'm looking forward to seeing old friends and meeting new ones.

Happy New Year!

Ren√©e
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at 6:30 in the lounge, look for a balloon.
item.why: Enjoy an eclectic variety of menu items to please the most discriminating palate along with steaks, fresh seafood, pizza and more.

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Wednesday Night Dinner
